item.title: School of Huawei Advanced Research Education
item.description:
The main technical coordinator and the owner of Machine Learning and Computer Vision specialization of the School of Huawei Advanced Research Education (briefly SHARE) at Lomonosov Moscow State University, the biggest Russian University.

Faculties included: Mechanics and Mathematics, Computational Mathematics and Cybernetics, Physics, Space Research.

Responsibilities:

  • Organizing the whole schedule of lectures (negotiation with technical experts and professors from both sides: Academia and Industry);
  • Maintaining the Machine Learning and Computer Vision specialization;
  • Creating and teaching Computer Vision, Machine Learning and Python courses.
